original_title: Dates fixed for debate on IMF Extended Fund Facility
original_body_lines: The debate on the Extended Fund Facility (EFF) of the International Monetary Fund (IMF) would be held on April 26, 27 and 28 in Parliament, the Parliament media unit said.
The decision was made during the Parliament Business Committee meeting at the parliament complex this morning.
Parliament will meet from April 25 to 28 and the vote on the debate will be held on April 28. (Ajith Siriwardana and Yohan Perera)
